headline: Three Reasons to Avoid MGM and One Stock to Buy Instead
summary: MGM Resorts currently trades at $38.09 per share and has shown little upside over the past six months, posting a small loss of 2.3%. The stock also fell short of the S&P 500’s 13.1% gain during that period.

headline: MGM Resorts price target lowered to $50 from $54 at JMP Securities
summary: JMP Securities analyst Jordan Bender lowered the firm’s price target on MGM Resorts (MGM) to $50 from $54 and keeps an Outperform rating on the shares. After touring and speaking with several general managers of land-based gaming casinos in Louisiana and Mississippi, JMP believes trends are stable, with no change in November gaming revenue compared to year-to-date trends in Louisiana and Mississippi, the analyst tells investors in a research note.
